 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרַף‎</span>] **verb** ==drip, drop== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***lade out water with the hand*** (as with ladle), compare Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ערפת‎</span> ***portico*** (whence rain ***drips***) see [[BDB#Hoffm|Hoffm]]<sup>Abh. d. GGW xxxvi, May, 1889, 12 f.</sup>; compare also Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***upper-room***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מערף ענן‎</span> [[Eccl.43.22|Eccl 43:22]] ***the dropping of a cloud***, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***irpu, irpitu, cloud(s)***</u></abbr>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמָיו יַעַרְפוּטָֿ֑ל‎</span> [[Deut.33.28|Deut 33:28]] ***his heavens drop dew***; figurative, of speech, intransitive, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲרֹף כַּמָּטָר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִקְחִי‎</span> [[Deut.32.2|Deut 32:2]] ***let my teaching drop like the rain*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּזַּל כַּטַּל אִמְרָתִי‎</span>). — compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעַף‎</span>.
